content:
In the Wintersemester 2022/2023 I decided to participate in the module &ldquo;Interaction in Virtual and Augmented Reality&rdquo;. It only had 15 open spaces, so I am very greatful that I was given one of those. It was very good experience and I can say with confident that my Unity skills greatly improved.
We were given the task to implement a locomotion and also an interaction technique, which we had to include in a given VR-environment. It was a pre-implemented parkour which we were supposed to improve and adapt. Here are a few screenshots of the standard parkour:
Standard parkour
title: Introduction

content: Interaction in Virtual and Augmented Reality Snowball Parkour Welcome to my university VR-Project about locomotion and interaction. My name is Kyu Hwan Yoo and I am currently doing my Master&rsquo;s degree at the Technical university Darmstadt. In this blog I will guide you through my development journey and I hope to give you a good insight about my ideas and struggles. So let&rsquo;s not waste any more and get started right away.
title: Home_title
